title: Allianz Global Investors - Floating Rate
body:
**The Task**

Create an online advertising campaign for Allianz Global Investors to raise awareness and increase inflows into the funds.

**The Solution**

Working within the Allianz brand guidelines we created animated ads to promote the benefits of two funds in their product range.

**The Results**

The advertising has raised awareness of the funds across the Nordic and Benelux regions, generating strong CTRs.
